query: Which online betting platform provides a welcome bonus of up to $1000 in bonus bets for new customers' first losses, runs NBA betting promotions, and is anticipated to extend the same sign-up offer to new users in Vermont, as reported by both CBSSports.com and Sporting News?

evidence_list.title: 2023 Kentucky online sports betting sites: Best legal sportsbooks, promos, bonuses, mobile apps, how to bet
evidence_list.author: CBS Sports Staff
evidence_list.fact: New customers can get up to $1000 in bonus bets if they lose their first bet.

evidence_list.title: NBA Rookie of the Year Odds - Wembanyama the early favorite
evidence_list.author: Sam Eggleston
evidence_list.fact: Additionally, Caesars has a competitive welcome bonus for new players and runs NBA betting promos for existing players.

evidence_list.title: Vermont Sportsbook Promos and Sports Betting Launch News
evidence_list.author: Martin Harris
evidence_list.fact: We expect Caesars to offer the same offer in VT is has elsewhere, with new sign-ups eligible to receive up to a $1,000 Bonus Bet if their first bet loses.

query: Which entity is currently engaged with Amazon to address competition concerns, facilitating dialogue with consumer groups against Meta, deploying staff within its AI Office for future regulations, and has previously focused on illegal content and disinformation issues related to the Israel-Hamas war, as reported by TechCrunch?

evidence_list.title: Amazon’s iRobot purchase sucks up formal competition concerns in EU
evidence_list.author: Natasha Lomas
evidence_list.fact: We continue to work through the process with the European Commission and are focused on addressing its questions and any identified concerns at this stage.

evidence_list.title: European consumer groups band together to fight Meta’s self-serving ad-free sub — branding it ‘unfair’ and ‘illegal’
evidence_list.author: Natasha Lomas
evidence_list.fact: The process also loops in the European Commission to help facilitate dialogue, assess issues and bring pressure to bear on unfair practices.

evidence_list.title: EU says incoming rules for general purpose AIs can evolve over time
evidence_list.author: Natasha Lomas
evidence_list.fact: And some of these staff will also be deployed within the European Commission,” they added.

evidence_list.title: Elon Musk’s X faces first DSA probe in EU over illegal content risks, moderation, transparency and deceptive UX design
evidence_list.author: Natasha Lomas
evidence_list.fact: Its earlier actions were focused on concerns about the spread of illegal content and disinformation related to the Israel-Hamas war.
